flawed_nl_solution:
Lana sold 12 muffins and has to sell 20 - 12 = 7 to hit her goal before the bake sale ends.
When she sells another 4 in the afternoon Lana has 7 - 4 = <<7-4=3>>3 muffins left to sell to meet her target.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
